channel.title: Silab items
channel.description:
Okay so heres the deal... I try to use silab items on a server that has them... You can spawn them and everything but when
they pop up it says something like "Item" ex: I spawn a "Bandos Godsword" it comes up as like a key and i see what item it is
it says "Item" So how do i make it so i can spawn them and wear them?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 28, 2008, 06:22:24 PM[/size][hr]Oh and
How do i edit things like to give stats? like make a DDS give like 100k plus in str or something>? And how to Take things
out of shops or put them in cause when i edit them nothing happens.... =/ :mad:

item.title: Silab items
item.dc:creator: @Lexii Lexii
item.description:
@Lexii wrote:

to change stats on your dds heres a short tut ill right for ya
first open up a notepad file and then drag items.cfg into it to open up that (thats what i do n e ways :P)
after u have that open search for the item you would like
then skip the first couple of numbers on there and go to the "0"s
change those to w/e u would like
the “0s” go in this order for stats/bonuses
for the attack bonuses
1.stab
2.slash
3.crush
4.magic
5.range
for the defence bonuses
6.stab
7.slash
8.crush
9.magic
10.range
for the other bonuses
11.strength
12.prayer

good luck
thats my 10 sec tutorial for ya ;D
~Lexi

Read full topic

item.title: Silab items
item.dc:creator: @o0_v_1_n_o0 o0 v 1 n o0
item.description:
@o0_v_1_n_o0 wrote:

Silabsoft client items show as keys and such because JaGeX rearranged the itemDef
You edit stats in item.cfg
Shops Idk what your problem is
